reasoning:

Got the Death consumable too, and that's *critical* here.

My current hand has some potential, but needs a nudge: 6H, 2H, 3C (Odd), KD, 6D, 4D, 3D (Odd). I have 4 Diamonds, but that 3 of Clubs is messing up my Flush! Since this is the Spades debuff, that 3 of Clubs will do nothing to help on any hand.  I have two of the Odd cards already, so that's a good start. I can move the 3 of Diamonds to sit next to the 3 of Clubs (7 to 3). The Death consumable can then convert the left card (the 3 of Clubs) to match the right card (the 3 of Diamonds), giving me the Flush I need.

Okay, let's break this down. With a Flush (Level 5) and these cards, I have a decent base score of 95 chips and 12 mult. That Odd Todd triggers on those 3s, giving me +62 chips, and that gets multiplied to a total of 80 mult with my Jokers. This gives me a rough total of 14,640 chips. Not enough for 22,000, but the real key is the Acrobat joker, which would give me a x3 multiplier. I can play the discard a bunch strategy!

But, first, I need that flush. Death is going to be key. Let me double check what Death actually does... "convert the left card into the right card." So, using Death with position 3 and position 7 is perfect. Position 3 will then be my target and 7 my source. 3C gets turned into 3D. 

Before I do anything else, let's make the move. Death will create the flush, then I can see what I can do with discards, or just go for the final hand play.

So, here we go: The Death tarot is at position 1, 3C at position 3, 3D at position 7. I'll use the JSON `{"action": "use_consumable", "positions": [1, 3, 7], "intended_hand_type": null, "estimated_chips": null}`.

Perfect. The play is set. Time to deal with these cards and get to that winning hand!
